format: html

Collect 5 together

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

list_of_files <- list.files(path = "1911/", pattern = "*.rds") %>% 
    str_c("1911/", .)

df <-
    list_of_files %>% 
    map_df(~read_rds(.))

df %>% 
    count(parish, sort = T)
```


```{r}
df <- df %>% 
    mutate(parish = str_remove_all(parish, "[:punct:]"),
           parish = str_remove_all(parish, "[0-9]"),
           parish = str_squish(parish))

df %>% 
    count(parish, sort = T)
```

## Join codes

```{r}
codes <- readxl::read_excel(here::here("data/agric_output_codebook.xlsx"))

codes <- codes %>% 
    select(col, desc)

df <- df %>% 
    inner_join(codes)

df <- df %>% 
    mutate(desc = fct_reorder(desc, col))
```


What does it look like?

```{r}
parishes <- df %>% 
    filter(nchar(parish) > 0,
           !str_detect(parish, "Summa")) %>% 
    distinct(parish) %>% 
    sample_n(20)

df %>% 
    filter(col %in% 2:20,
           parish %in% parishes$parish) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(value, desc, fill = parish)) +
    geom_col(show.legend = F) +
    facet_wrap(~ parish)
```


```{r}
df %>% 
    filter(parish == "Alsike")


```


## Map

### Map prep and joins

```{r}
library(sf)
```

The names comes from the forsamlingar names map in `maps` repo.

```{r}
names <- read_rds("data/forsamlingar_names.rds")

names <- names %>% 
    mutate(namn = str_remove(namn, "fÃ¶rsamling"),
           namn = str_squish(namn)) %>% 
    rename(parish = namn)

df %>% 
    distinct(parish) %>% 
    inner_join(names, )
```


```{r}
map <- read_rds("data/kommun_map.rds")

map_areas <- map %>%
  as_tibble() %>%
  select(kn_namn)

df %>% 
    count(parish)

```


```{r}
gg_iraph_map <- map %>% 
    ggplot() +
    geom_sf_interactive(aes(tooltip = kn_namn)) +
    theme_void()

girafe(
  ggobj = gg_iraph_map,
  width_svg = 8,
  height_svg = 4,
  options = list(
    # opts_tooltip(css = tooltip_css, delay_mouseover = 0, delay_mouseout = 0),
    opts_hover_inv(css = "opacity:0.1;"),
    opts_hover(css = "stroke-width:2;")
  )
)
```
